website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a drone that is advanced yet easy to use for a youth who is an avid hobbyist, this is a strong contender. It's also ideal for kids who want to take photos or shoot live video with the HD camera.
pros: Has many impressive features (including a high-definition camera and WiFi connectivity), yet is easy to set up and use
Ideal for youngsters who love to fly drones and are ready to upgrade to a reasonably priced model packed with user-friendly technology
cons: Doesn't always fly well in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: It’s gone!!
customer_reviews.text: A friend purchased this drone and after seeing them operate theirs, we purchased the exact same one. We flew it twice with a great experience both times, but the third flight was a completely different story. Within seconds of lift off, it immediately shot high and took off with no response to the controller. We stood dumbfounded and watched it for at least a quarter of a mile until it was completely out of site. We read up more and learned this might be a defect. We reached out to the Company by email last Sunday but no response so far. Very disappointed- we also purchased extra batteries and charger anticipating a long and enjoyable experience with this drone.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I just got a defective one but.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I just got a defective one but.... Had nothing but trouble pairing it to controller. Instructions are awful if not just incorrect, why can't they have an American English speaking drone enthusiast proof read them first. It would fly for 5-15 seconds then it would just shut down and crash.
customer_reviews.author: Chester

customer_reviews.title: Watch your money fly away with no control.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, as a christmas gift. We went to the park and saw $119.00 dollars fly away in a matter off minutes. Hahahaha we had no control over the drone. As soon as it got off the ground it just kept going up up up and away. We never found it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonel

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you don't mind never seeing it again....
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son received this for Christmas last year. This Halloween, with many operating hours of experience, he launched it with my wife standing next to him. After a few minutes it suddenly started rising and accelerating upward without any input from my son. Frantically he tried to regain control, rapidly pressing the return home button, but the drone simply took off and flew away. Our neighbor came across the street and explained the same thing happened to him a few weeks before. Turns out he also had a Holy Stone drone. We recommend finding a better product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Butte

customer_reviews.title: Not only is it a waste of time needing to return a defective product
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box one of the motors on the drone didn't function, and was actually quite difficult to spin with your hand compared to the other motors. Reading the instructions, it states if one of the propellers isn't spinning compared to the others the motor is burned out. Not only is it a waste of time needing to return a defective product, but this was a gift for a significant other making it even worse. You'd expect more for a drone over $100, at least give me a few flights before you burn out!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Apfel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool drone
customer_reviews.text: I flew this drone today and I liked it overall. It's manageable in high altitud, very fast and has a nice design. I saw some pros and cons. Pros: Drone is very stable, easy to fly. Fits perfectly for beginners. Transmitter is pretty simple to understand. App works very well. Controls' app are very easy to handle. Clean flips. Outstanding take off and landing. Cons: When battery is low some commands are not receptibles. Camera video was a little bit wavy. To switch the baterry you have to dismount camera and unscrew camera's mount. Other than that I recommend this item for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Johan

customer_reviews.title: One of the best drones out right now but just know what to expect
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars. Great drone just know what you were getting. For an intermediate drone with good battery life, a 250 to 300 feet connectivity with ththe remote, and decent camera you can't beat this drone. If you come into it with expectations of the same performance and connectivity of $1000 drone you're setting yourself up for disappointment . That said, this price range market of 150-250 there is no drone even close to this one in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband and he lost it, ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Holy Stone sent me a new drone. Love it. Thank you for being an excellent seller! Bought this for my husband and he lost it, due to some malfunction, on its first flight outside. He said he tried to bring it back down with the remote, and it didn't work. :/
customer_reviews.author: Tina Tang

customer_reviews.title: he could only enjoy it for few minutes
customer_reviews.text: I am so dissapointed. I bought this product for my boyfriend's birthday, he could only enjoy it for few minutes, it started to fly ok and after there was no control, went into the wood and we never saw it again. He phushed the return bottom, tried to move it to the right and left, there was not response from the device, continued flying like it had mind of is own. It was a waste of money, that thing made me so sad because was the only gift i got for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as expected. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This drone was fun to fly but all it took was one small crash to break. I flew it a handful of times (short flights) while taking it easy to get the hang of the controls. Then on my first slightly longer outdoor flight it went down in my neighbor's lawn. Now one of the motors is shot and the thing won't fly at all. Motor replacement requires disassembling the whole thing and soldering some components and that sounds like a total pain. I expected much better than that for the money.
customer_reviews.author: cjhuff

customer_reviews.title: Holly Stone Drone
customer_reviews.text: Thinking about getting a drone? Look no further. The Holy Stone F181W is perfect for getting familiar with the ground work needed to maneuver and capture pictures with your drone. It gets even better when you learn how to flip the drone and continue flying. Amazing response and maneuverability for an affordable price. Thank you Holy Stone for providing a product that's affordable and the newbies can enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Art Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Well that was a waste of 120 bucks
customer_reviews.text: Well that was a waste of 120 bucks... I charged it. I followed the instructions. I started it. It went up, down, back, forth, and behaved as I expected and then it hovered for a second as if to say goodbye and then it just started flying away from me. There were no buttons being pushed and off it decided to go. Nothing I pushed had any impact on the behavior of the drone and it flew off the field and over the water. You can guess the rest. I would have been happier if I could have actually controlled the crash and smashed it into something on purpose but I might as well have not had a controller. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Monaco

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING.!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest thing since sliced bread in my humble opinion. I'm not big into tech generally, but this is easy from start to finish. Learning, Set up all easy not to mention minimal assembly involved. These are useful for so many different purposes I wouldn't want to take your time listing them all but it's hundreds of uses at least. I recommend getting at least one main unit, along with some extra batteries & other accessories so you can fly for hours if you want to. It is addicting like video games but so much more fun outside with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: NO SCREEN !!!!
customer_reviews.text: The add shows a screen included without any mention of the screen being a smart phone that the customer must provide !!!! I do not have or use a smart phone and do not plane to purchase one. That leaves me no choice but to return the copter for a refund! The add is misleading and in error and the add should be changed immediately. Extremely deceiving the customer with the contents of the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: torpedo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the money
customer_reviews.text: This drone is quite amazing for what you pay. My 11 year old is in love with the thing, and we had previously tried a more expensive competitor’s model that she hates and won’t use. The video is very good and the controls are done well - not too touchy. I love that speed can be controlled in steps. It hovers nicely, though it is prone to slight drifting... this is the only criticism I have of the unit, but again, the small amount of drift is still rather remarkable for a drone in this price range. Customer service has been outstanding. Don’t hesitate to get one if you’re considering it!!
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Drone for Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Pros: * It is big, 12" x 12" * Controller features dedicated buttons * two batteries! * batteries charge via standard micro-usb cable. * batteries install and remove simply. Cons: * Blade guards fall off easily and are black which makes them difficult to find in grass. * controller sticks get stuck sometimes and do not auto-spring to center. * "land soon" flashing lights period longer than other drones. * cell phone holder not big enough for plus sized phone in (slim) case. * blades are all black, prefer when the front blades are a highlight color
customer_reviews.author: MSB/MEB

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PEOPLE and PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this unit and found it to be exactly as described. The 'copter is a good flyer and the controls are completely functional and easy to learn. Downloaded the app which seems to do exactly what it is designed to do, note that I have not flown the 'copter through the app but used it to operate the camera functions. The. Camera is impresssive, but the greatest part the purchase is the customer service. These people are on top of their business and will do what is necessary for your complete satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Getgood

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a christmas gift for my son. Initially we had some trouble with the control by phone, however customer service with this company is excellent they responded quickly and stuck with us until the problem was resolved. Now we can control the copter from the phone or control, the return to home works great, its easy to take off and land the builtin stunt flip is great. It's so much fun that we fight to see who gets to fly it. As for the customer service, can't say enough about them, suffice it to say that I wish other companies would follow there lead. Keep up the great work guys. You've got a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: PCR&R

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner drone - relatively stable and fun to fly
customer_reviews.text: We learned flying drones on this drone. It's pretty fun and easy to get used to. It is not super durable, but I wouldn't expect that for the price we pay. Nevertheless, Holy Stone stands firmly behind their warranty and they proved it to us when they replaced parts and even a whole drone at one point due to defects. The only thing I have against it is that the battery life isn't that great. But again, this isn't any different from other drones in its class. So it's cool. I recommend this drone as a beginner drone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a starter drone your kids can use
customer_reviews.text: I have been really pleased with this drone. It doesn’t have the features you get in an expensive drone but you also don’t have to register it. It flies pretty well. It’s my first drone and I found it complicated to get going and a little tricky to maneuver but I think that’s typical. My kids can fly it better than I can. One thing I like is that the parts are easy to replace and inexpensive or free. I burned out one of the motors when I got it tangled in a tree and was able to order a replacement motor easily. Support is very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Bravoking

customer_reviews.title: One of the motors does not seem to be as good as the other three
customer_reviews.text: The battery lasts 7 minutes MAX and as it wears down, the performance greatly diminishes. One of the motors does not seem to be as good as the other three. The quality of the camera is pretty good, but you can barely get it in the air before it dies. Follow up The company was very responsive to my concerns. They offered a free set of 4 replacement motors and also 2 extra backup batteries, for which I accepted and were delivered quite quickly. Very impressed with the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Calabrase

customer_reviews.title: REVISED REVIEW - Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: We followed the directions exactly as stated. The drone was fully charged, within control range, and the temperature outside was 60 degrees. Thank you very much for your quick assistance and replacing our drone. We have used the replacement drone and had no problems. Thank you again for all your help!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good drone
customer_reviews.text: So, let's start by stating that that drone costs a hair over $100, which is not much. The video broadcast to your mobile device is relatively low latency (good) and low quality (to be expected). Controls for the drone are pretty good. It's pretty easy to fly/control, but it doesn't do great with even minimal wind. The quality of the HD Video which is recorded on a MicroSD is the only disappointment here. It's pretty low quality and highly impacted by the vibration of the drone (there's no rubber vibration dampeners on the camera attachment for example). Anyway, it's fun, feels relatively sturdy, and you're not really going to do any better for $100!
customer_reviews.author: T. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding drone for the price. Has a camera that you can see through your phone, excellent control. Holds altitude within a few inches, easy to fly and durable - have crashed it a few times and no issues. Has extra battery and easy to follow instructions. Perfect for a first time drone flyer, or someone who wants to try drone flying without forking over huge dollars. Only complaint is short battery life if you have everything going (camera with wifi enabled). If you remove the camera; flying time is much longer. Super fun to fly, and a great value for a nice drone.
customer_reviews.author: jessejen257

customer_reviews.title: Ok for practice. Don't expect too much.
customer_reviews.text: Really just a practice drone. Don't expect too much! It is very wind affected in even a slight wind. Hard to control in the wind. Great indoors, easy to control there. Camera is not good. Very glitchy filming. Not a HD camera. Like I said. A good practice drone or for a child or adult to practice with. After reading this review, Joiln of Holy Stone contacted me and offered anotger camera and battery. I accepted the camera only as I had order additional batteries. The new camera worked better than the original. I was impressed with the service after the fact and Jolin responding unsolicited to make tge customer happy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D Porch

customer_reviews.title: Class act company!
customer_reviews.text: Holy Stone? Holy piece of junk!! Gave to my son for his birthday. After using it only twice, one propeller won't move. So much for that $$. UPDATE....Holy Stone did something amazing. They made everything right. Yes, they replaced the drone immediately. We are now flying high with the new drone. Holy Stone worked with us to fine the problem. Would highly recommend this item and would not hesitate to purchase any of their products. Class act company.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: If you can only buy one first drone, the F181W is the one, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: What a great sub 250g flyer the F181W is. It was so much more than I expected for the price. This is a great quad for everyone. The 4 speeds make it a little speed demon while the lower speed allows new pilots the forgiveness needed to make mistakes, not to mention it’s a durable drone, I crashed a lot in the beginning while learning to fly fast and it’s survived them all with no issues. Lastly the 1080p camera is a huge step from the 720p the removable camera leaves hope for camera upgrades later on. Bottom line, you’ll be hard pressed to find a better flyer for under $100 than this one, I know I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Terdelyi

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This drone works really well, but be aware that you must screw the landing gear and prop guards on or they will be constantly falling off. My husband didn’t read the instructions so that’s our fault, but so far we’ve lost one side of the landing gear and one prop guard. If they were a bright colour they’d be easier to find and reattach. I went to return this and flipped through the manual to make sure I had all the pieces. That’s when I read about attaching the screws. Ugh. So my advice is READ THE MANUAL like you’re supposed to!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Beck

customer_reviews.title: INSIDE DRONE
customer_reviews.text: Gone. Third flight outside (no wind). I was playing around in my living room with no issue. Took it outside, put drone in "headless mode" and it just elevated and took off. It would not respond to controls at all. Should have got out of range and automatically returned to the transmitter, according to the manual. It made it over, probably, 100ft trees and I lost sight of it. Buyer beware. This is a INSIDE DRONE. It is way to light to handle even a 1mph wind gust. This is a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Marshbuster

customer_reviews.title: Great drone and amazing customer support
customer_reviews.text: Setup for this drone is a breeze and after charing the batteries I was able to start flying right away. After just a few mins I accidentially made contact with a tree branch and damaged something such that it was not able to fly again. I contacted Holy Stone to see if they could tell me what part I needed to replace and after a few back and forth emails they offered to send me a brand new drone. Communication with customer service was excellent, I think I got a reply within 15 mins of sending the initial email. I can't say enough about their customer service. The replacement drone flies perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G

customer_reviews.title: Decieving customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love this drone, I originally purchased for the camera but the drone itself is proetty awesome, it took me a minute to get the camera figured out but holy stone customer service hooked me right up. Thanx again Holy Stone for a awesome experience. I want to update my review, I left a positive review for my free battery but I called holy stone and they started trying to make me jump through hoops. They are deceiving, will not order again from holy stone
customer_reviews.author: Tim G

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Drone started and flew higher than I could see and went out of control, would not respond to the remote. First one broke within 2 weeks and thought I would give it a shot again. Great product if it would work. Wasted over $200 on this plus extra batteries
customer_reviews.author: The Straws

customer_reviews.title: So easy a 6y/o can do it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but able to do advanced things. This is the 4th drone we have bought. My 6y/o kid saw one on clearance at Sears and we bought it for $20 and he loved it.....until my wife's hair strangled it like it does the vacuum. 2 more drones with similar issues, tears, and we went for an upgrade. He loves it, it's intuitive, I like that it doesn't suck up hair from the floor, and it's got a camera. Only issue is that the camera vibrates a little bit with as many crashes as it has been through I don't know that that is a manufacturer issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short Run Time and Uncontrollable Outside
customer_reviews.text: This drone is uncontrollable outside. Even a breeze that is virtually unnoticeable by human perception dramatically affects maneuverability of this drone to the point that it's of no use - on a considerably calm, windless, day. The point of purchasing this thing was to have aerial photos/videos of our trips when we are on vacation. That's an impossibility with this drone. "Trimming" (right, left, etc) does absolutely nothing meaningful to correct the constant drift. It WILL NOT HOVER in place. Two hour charge for 10 minutes of flying, ok video at best, and a whole lot of doing nothing useful. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: H. A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Versatile Drone with Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT drone for learning to fly if you also want a streaming camera function. I researched for about a week and finally pulled the trigger on this one. One piece of advice I'll give is that if you are using it outside, then there should be little or no wind. Since this is my first drone, I don't have lots of experience, but the drone drifts in the wind - so it's better for novice users to be sure the weather is calm. Overall great experience for me and my 5 yr old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Atul Kaushal

customer_reviews.title: Nice introductory Drone for a newbie, holds up well to inexperience!
customer_reviews.text: This little drone has a nice video quality for the price, and holds up well to my inexperience causing probably more crashes than the average person would experience. Also, I lost it up in the tree tops of northern NH, where it sat for a few weeks, exposed to the elements, until the leaves fell and wind brought it to the ground. Not one piece was missing from it, or broken off. I was very happy to find it, and impressed! I do have some trouble navigating, and it seems to drift away from me, but I suspect that is user error, not the drone.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie StPierre

customer_reviews.title: Very easy controls to use the Drone.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Drone and I received it as a gift from my Daughter. The controls are very easy to use and the flying is a lot of fun. The price was moderate for the Drone of a beginner. The photos I took were crisp and clear as well as the video content. I would highly recommend this company to anyone who is interested in obtaining a Drone. I have dealt with the Customer Service department and their responses and attentiveness has been of the highest caliber.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa torrieri

customer_reviews.title: Better off watching a quick YouTube video to set-up than ...
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with this purchase. Making arrangements to return or get some serious technical support. Arrived promptly and seemingly no damage. Better off watching a quick YouTube video to set-up than manual. My problem is this was a birthday gift and it doesn't fly left or right. Followed instruction manual precisely. Horrible way to gift something - the surprise of getting your very first drone...and you can't control it. Hopefully Holy Stone and/or Amazon will contact us. Will update this review if things go better than they have so far.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Spidey

customer_reviews.title: Disappearing Act
customer_reviews.text: After researching purchased for my husband for birthday present. He was very excited and setup was easy enough. Until he started flying.. We went to this spacious spot. On the first try the once the drone got about 10/15 feet in the air it just ascended into wind unresponsive to the remote and kept climbing until it finally disappeared! I knew it was trouble when I saw amongst the birds! My poor husband frantically kept hitting the return and the down throttle but it just would not respond. We both were shocked as we looked in dismay! My husband was very disappointed. Poor guy searched to no avail for that drone.
customer_reviews.author: Alwayshope

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: This is my second drone. The first one was bought 2 1/2 yrs. ago. Out the box the F181W worked as advertised and much easier to fly vs. the other one. In our living room had it at a hover, camera working, and app installed on IPhone in about 30 minutes . Be sure you read the instruction manual ( short read). The controls are smooth, senseitivity was where I like it and , maintaining a hover was easy. Drones have come a long way in the last 3 years, now affordable, but with improvements that were needed( headless mode, camera, wifi, to name a few). Looking forward to hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rattler10jr

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner and indoor training drone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone to learn to fly manually. Because of the wind, I fly complex patterns mostly indoors until the battery dies. I always use the blade guards as the drone will harmlessly just bounce off a wall without doing damage. I don't bother with the camera to extend battery life and picture quality is not great. It's taken quite a beating and keeps on flying. I wish the battery life was better. It runs out in less than 10 minutes. It does tend to run hot so let the quad cool down when changing batteries. The altitude hold feature works quite well considering they're using barometric pressure instead of GPS.
customer_reviews.author: Enzo

customer_reviews.title: One of the best drone out there.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase for myself. The first one was almost 3 years ago for my son. We are quite happy with the product. it drifts a bit but once you learn it how to control then it is easy to keep it under control. For its price it is hard to beat it. I have even gotten additional batteries to keep flying it on our back yard. I also check my gators for pine tree needles :) I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Eren A. Ozgul

customer_reviews.title: Great first drone!!
customer_reviews.text: This drone is really impressive!! It is my first drone and its really easy and straight forward to fly. The kit comes with everything you need and some spare blades! Initially I had a little trouble with it, but after speaking with the customer support, we were able to get everything straightened out! The company as a whole, was very helpful, attentive and it was a pleasure to deal with them! The drone is a ton of fun to fly! If you download the app, you can watch it fly in live time! You can also record your flight video on a micro memory card. Really a great product for the money! 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Original drone was faulty but Holy Stone made up for it
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad drone but not a good one either. I had a lot of problems with the range being very limited and ultimately returned this and purchased another drone. Since it might have been a faulty product I won’t slam the manufacturer. Seller was fantastic and no problems there Update: So Holy Stone reaches out to me to see what happened to my drone. I explained the situation and sent out a free drone without me asking. The new drone works well. It must have just been a bad drone. Holy Stone has been great and I would purchase another product from them.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone and I love it. I havn't had a chance to fly it very much, because it is snowy outside, but I've been flying it around the house and it is a blast. Thanks for a great product Holy Stone. The adjustment knob for the smart phone holder was missing and after a call to customer service, ,it was replaced without any fuzz what so ever. I can't say enough about their customer service. It is excellent. Keep up the good service Holy Stone. I will buy from you again.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: This is my 1st Drone and my experience for the last two days since receiving it has been a great one. The F181 drone has differe
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was as stated. This is my 1st Drone and my experience for the last two days since receiving it has been a great one. The F181 drone has different modes which has allowed a biginer like me to learn to fly it. Flying it has been extremely fun! The 2 battery package is good and allows me to get enough flying (7-10 minutes) per battery before needing to recharge. The drone has held up well through several crashes. I now there are more expensive models but for a beginner, this has been a positive experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: FitnessChick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great for beginners and experts alike.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this drone to replace a cheaper drone I received for Christmas for my daughter. This one is hands down night and day from the other one. The instructions are easy to follow and they give great advice for beginners like myself. I took this drone out on a windy day and it still performed with no issues. The camera app works great and was easy to download. I cant wait to use this drone on vacations with my children. It is the perfect size and weight to travel with and carry around and the remote control buttons are easy to read and understand. Still learning how to control it like the pros, but having fun in the process.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn and Holy Stone support was excellent.
customer_reviews.text: The drone was very easy to set up and begin flying. Took a little time to learn to calibrate but once I figured that out it was easy to learn to control. We had a problem with a motor that stopped working and contacted Holy Stone support. They said it the motor probably burned out from too long flying without letting it cool down. They shipped me replacement motors free of charge and provided instructions to video on replacing motor, which wasn't too difficult. Working on getting the live video/camera working. Their support has been excellent and very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Gehring

customer_reviews.title: Holy Stone customer service ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my F181W Drone a while ago and have had a lot of phone playing with it. It came bundled with a 3D Headset (VR Glasses) at NO COST, too, an excellent bargain. Over time I've purchased replacement parts for it and have had some issues with the batteries charging, but EVERY TIME I've contacted Holy Stone about something with the drone, their customer service has been EXCELLENT! They have always answered every question I've had, and taken care of any issues I've had in operating the drone. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product - I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the quality of this product. My daughter is 10 years old and she is flying it like a pro, it is so stable. The camera quality is not bad at all considering the price of the kit. Flies great indoors and outdoors when there is no wind. Great features to it like altitude holder, flips in the air, etc. The app for the phone is also working well. I definitively recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: C0pperH6ad

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Well, indoors it was ok. Learned quickly how to fly it and the video was pretty good. It is very maneuverable and the controls are very intuitive. The flip is great for impressing the grandkids. I want to get a high-end drone but wanted to learn how to fly them first​, so this was a natural choice. Had some questions about a few things and the support was very quick and very helpful which is not common these days. Well worth the $120.
customer_reviews.author: Thames River Arms

customer_reviews.title: Ok drone
customer_reviews.text: The drone flies good but doesn't want to stay in place. It gets out of control very easily. It goes pretty far though. The camera isn't great but you can figure out what your looking at. For some reason it was hard for me to find the app on Apple Store. I had to google it in order to find the right one. For a beginner drone it's ok. I got it for my 5 year old but if I let him fly it it would be wrecked because it gets out of control so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Drone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, inexpensive, durable, and responsive little drone. The photo/video is good enough for experimenting and having fun. Comes with a few extra gears and props, and as of right now I've only had to replace one of the small gears and I've crashed it numerous times. Battery life is meh, but for the price you can't expect much more. FPV is jittery at times, even with my Pixel XL, but mostly flyable. My biggest complaint is how annoying the battery is to remove and replace. Note: They do incentivize reviews by sending you a free battery if you review them.
customer_reviews.author: Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Good choice to start
customer_reviews.text: This drone is easy to fly, I have only run about 10 battery cycles at this time. The wifi video is easy to connect and helpful when the drone gets out of direct vision. It responds well to the controller, I have not flown using the camera as a controller. The only issue I’ve noticed is a wavy video image when recording, but it’s better than I expected. It takes some getting used to as I-am still a novice drone user.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H Philip

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my 24 year old boyfriend for a birthday gift and we have not been disappointed! The camera isn't as good as say a ...
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research on drones before purchasing and even waited 2 weeks when they ran out of stock for this one. I bought it for my 24 year old boyfriend for a birthday gift and we have not been disappointed! The camera isn't as good as say a GoPro or your phone but we recorded a sunset and it was beautiful! Flying took some getting used to, and we crashed it a few times. But the little thing is tough and is still working great! Only comment is make sure you keep the spare battery charged-the 10-12 minutes of flight time can go fast. Definite buy for new drone enthusiasts!
customer_reviews.author: hm2012

customer_reviews.title: Good starter drone
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Christmas and really likes it. It's a $100 drone so it's good, but not amazing. It flies well, but doesn't hover perfectly. Its tends to drift a bit left and right, but this can be adjusted (each time it starts up). I'm glad it came with a micro SD card rather than have to buy one separately. I like that it came with the extra battery as well. It takes fun picture and video which get synched right to his phone when using the app. That's very convenient. I'm glad it has guards because he can be a bit reckless with it. It's a great starter drone for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: this drone is totally unflyable---the thing has a mind of ...
customer_reviews.text: this drone is totally unflyable---the thing has a mind of its own and I can not trim it fast enough to get it to fly straight,, I will have to sell it at a garage sale. Update: I was contacted by the manufacturer and was given a procedure to calibrate the gyros so the drone could fly straight and controllable. I followed their procedure and it worked as advertised. I was able to fly it around the back yard and trim it so it would hover wherever I wanted. So much more fun now.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Atchison

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for beginners
customer_reviews.text: One of the best beginner's drone. I flew it indoors and outdoors. In the indoors, it was quite stable and easy to manage. But in the outdoors it was a bit difficult to handle due to wind etc. This is my first drone and I am happy that even after falling down a few times, it is still the same and works the same. I was a bit disappointed by the flimsy body, but it turns out that its great for falling down and still being the same. I would definitely recommend for the beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Farjad Habib

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: Assembly/setup is minimal. Very easy to fly. Takes ok pictures and video. I probably wouldn't classify the video as high def. I don't think the frames per second is that good. Range is probably 150 feet. It can be tough to control when it's breezy. Once when flying it, when it cleared the trees it was in a pretty stiff breeze. I just switched the throttle to expert mode for more power and it came back to me without a problem. Just don't panic when flying it. It takes some practice to keep from over controlling it. Cool toy for the money. Age rated 14+. I agree 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Pjenjen

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it stays in one piece (update)
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play with until pieces started falling off mid-flight (no crashes). Price isn't bad but you get what you pay for. I would recommend making sure all pieces are secure before flying over water or anywhere that would be difficult to retrieve pieces. Update: I received a replacement drone by the seller. This one works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: EnlightenYou

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service by Holy Stone
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with drone but Holy Stone responded immediately to resolve. First day flying husband hit the One Key Return button and drone took off in opposite direction, lost forever. Emailed Holy Stone and their Customer Rep Suity responded in 20 minutes (on a Sunday night!) He took time to discuss and ended up sending us replacement drone. Holy Stone stands behind their product (even if it flies away.) After Suity's advice we should have no future issues and look forward to fun flying. Thank you Holy Stone!
customer_reviews.author: Rosehopp

customer_reviews.title: The drone was easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: The drone was easy to fly. However, it had a few slight problems. It would not hover unless you used the trim buttons. When doing that the other direction trim adjustments were changed. Finally it could almost hover, but by then the fly time was half over. I really did like the overall operation and ease of flying the drone. The pictures and video were good, but the pictures were better than the video. I am going to buy another F181W Holy Stone drone since my initial one drifted over and landed in the Atlantic Ocean where I was unable to retrieve the drone..
customer_reviews.author: Frank Dacey

customer_reviews.title: drone was defective.  hard to give it more then 1 star.  didn't work right.
customer_reviews.text: its hard to give this product a decent review because I had a bad experience with the one that was sent to me. I have plenty of experience flying drones, and I got this one for my teenager. but when it first takes off, it went up and instantly back. I trimmed it out completely forward and it still went backwards. the drone appeared to be fine. battery was installed fully, ( sometimes battery placement can make the drone lean ). but this drone was simply defective. I returned it for a full refund and did not purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Flyaway risk
customer_reviews.text: I got one for step son. He assembled it and got it the air very easily and effeciently. He took it up to just above the altitude of the 2 story house, when it started to drift. He tried to get it to come back, but we watched it fly away to the northwest over the rooftops. Goodbye.
customer_reviews.author: arrowspace

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money or headache
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Not only did the drone take off and fly uncontrollably, but when we tried to connect with Holy Stone's customer service, we at first were unable to connect, and when we finally did, we found the experience to be very poor. Not sure who wrote all the other glowing reviews, but those don't match at all what our experience has been. Not worth the money and headache!
customer_reviews.author: pl4x2jj

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this drone!
customer_reviews.text: I an very happy with my first drone purchase - the F181W. It has many features not found on similarly priced drones, and was easy to learn to fly. The included 2nd battery is a BIG plus, and am getting anywhere from 10-15 mins. flight time with each. I had a problem with the camera, but Ally from Holy Stone customer service promptly sent out a replacement no charge. I received it in 2 days. Overall, I was (and AM) very happy that I purchased this! Great product and great customer service and support.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sager

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Holy Stone F181W drone for my 9 year old daughter for Xmas 2017. I thought it might be too complicated and sensitive for her at her age, but the drone is super easy to learn to control and a blast to fly!! Within 2 hours of opening the box, she was weaving the drone through and between a dining room table chair obstacle course, landing it in her hand, and using it to lift and transport small animal figurines at playtime. I don't think that you can go wrong with this drone for a novice pilot!
customer_reviews.author: Brynn's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Works temporarily, but will fail and has dangerous chargers that can destroy batteries and start fires.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 drones and they worked OK initially, with the exception that the charging capability is dangerous and can result in a fire. The chargers do not shut off automatically and you have to babysit them to ensure over-charging does not happen that will create damage. They even come with a warning that not removing batteries from chargers may result in battery damage and a fire. After a couple weeks of light use, the drones both refused to pair and became paperweights and i returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Colby A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Drone flew off on its own
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!!! Holy Stone is sending a replacement drone for free best customer service I have ever experienced they really stand behind their products. Set up the drone took it out for it's first flight and it just went up and kept going and would not take any controll from the controller at all have looked for 3hrs for it and still can't find it must have gone into the marsh land on the outside of the neighborhood really disappointed in the quality. Can't even return it do to it being lost.
customer_reviews.author: Fidgetycat

customer_reviews.title: Best beginner drone, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, this thing is awesome. For a $100 drone this thing exceeds my expectations. I love the 25%-100% power settings as it helps during the learning curve. Came with replacement parts, an SD card, and jab adapter to transfer video and pictures - never saw this coming. Don't be like and forget to put the screws in and wonder why the landing gear keeps falling out, lol. I was too busy to fly it than read the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: MCarr

customer_reviews.title: First time user, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my husband who wanted a drone for a long time. He practice in the house for a while and then went on an adventure. Got photos of places we have never been before. Works great with app and so far so good, he hasn't lost it. Easy to use. May have to upgrade sometime and will definitely buy another Holy Stone.
customer_reviews.author: m88m

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginner. Easy to fly after reading instructions!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons 12th birthday. He loves it. It is easy to use after reading the instructions. Still trying to get the app and camera to work, but the drone itself is worth the cost!! Comes with 2 batteries which is great. I read on-line reviews about beginner drones before my purchase. I would definitely buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous User

customer_reviews.title: updated review:  sent replacement by manufacturer and it seems to be a decent product
customer_reviews.text: the manufacturer ended up responding and sent me a replacement unit, so far it works well. I can't comment on how durable or well it flies outdoors yet, but I wanted to update this review and to reflect that the manufacturer seems to be responsive, accommodating and concerned with their product. I hope it works well, indoors during our testing it seems to work well. ---- Original review ----- No response at all to an email sent to manufacturer, package came damaged and the product offerings are confusing and it's difficult to know which is the more current one. Went to local store and purchased a Rage RC Century FPV WiFi HD Drone instead.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: FUN FUN
customer_reviews.text: Fun and straight forward. I have not hooked up the camera yet because I know I will try to do too much too fast before I have good control. I look forward to writing again after I use all functions.
customer_reviews.author: bob plummer

customer_reviews.title: so I called to the customer service line and I spoke with Carrie (she has a great customer skills) she helped to receive a new camera ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first Drone from Holy Stone, the camera's drone do not work, so I called to the customer service line and I spoke with Carrie (she has a great customer skills) she helped to receive a new camera in two days. Now, I am learning to fly the drone and its to cool. I will recommend you to buy from Holy Stone.
customer_reviews.author: German Martinez

customer_reviews.title: All in all pretty decent for first time drone flying.
customer_reviews.text: Drone is exceptionally easy to fly. Quick assembly. Was up and running in about 10 min after charging the batteries. Battery life seems short. I can only get about 5-7 minutes of flight time. Camera is slow to show up on phone but is pretty clear after it does. Using for recreation. Had one issue where drone lost connection and flew away on its own. Luckily it landed in the neighbors yard.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Fun and so far indestructible!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this drone a lot, but not as much as my son! He played with it until the batteries were totally dead. (He’s 33). I am glad that you will be sending me another battery with this review because it is so fun that even 30 minuets isn’t going to be enough. Wish it could last longer. It is is so forgiving with the blade protectors, and I know because I have wrecked it a bunch! I haven’t tried to get a picture off the sd card yet. Hoping it is easy.
customer_reviews.author: R. J.  Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Fun and seems well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first drone I have purchased so I really don't have anything to compare it to but it seems very well made. It will take me a lot of practice but I will get it. There are a couple things I had trouble with. I couldn't get it connected to the two phones I have for it and the battery doesn't last very long but it sounds like that is how all of them are. I purchased it for my mom for father's day and we are enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Drone
customer_reviews.text: The drone works absolutely perfectly, very easy to learn how to use with very detailed instructions. The battery life does not last that long, BUT it lasts as long as they stated in the description of the product. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the fact that the pictures that the drone takes are always slightly fuzzy and never really clear, my guess is that its from the vibration of the drone itself while its in the air, other than that, everything else works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Don Danley

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE:  Drone loses remote connection easily.
customer_reviews.text: This drone has nice features but lacks quality where it is needed. After only a handful of flights, the drone stopped responding to the remote (closer than 75ft) and got stuck in a tree. Rain and windstorm brought it down, destroyed. The instructions clearly state the remote is connected to over 300 feet. Why it lost communication at less than 100 is a big question here. I definitely would not recommend this drone to anyone who is looking for a beginner’s drone to learn on.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse J. Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Right off the bat, the controls were hard to learn. Then, it was nearly impossible to fly in the wind. None of the settings made sense and the features were hard to access and use. The app was very bad, with no instructions or user-friendliness. Then, on the SECOND day of having it, it was up about fifteen feet when it just started tumbling to the ground. I had no control, only was able to watch it fall. After picking it up, it looked fine, but it would not take off. I turned it off and back on about 20 times, but it still wouldn't take off. Overall, very unsatisfied. (I only gave it a two because it looked cool)
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun to fly!
customer_reviews.text: The drone was delivered on time and in great condition. Charging the battery didn't take too long for the first charge and was flying around the house a few hours after receipt, and reading through the control directions. Syncing the phone to the drone took a little bit of time, but once done, worked with no problems at all. Clear picture from the drone camera to the phone. No balanced it for stable flight indoors, too windy to take outdoors but will soon. Great FPV, fun to fly, looking forward to many hours flying the HS F181W.
customer_reviews.author: Wolcott

customer_reviews.title: Seems to drift, even indoors — but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying a drone. It reminds me of the inexpensive radio controlled helicopter that my daughter and I bought at a mall (I.e., in a highly controlled environment) several years ago. Pretty easy to do final assembly. I’m glad that they include extra gears and screws in the package because one of the mini gears fell out after only 20 minutes of total use. Given the price, my only “complaint” is that the unit tends to drift even when I use it indoors (so absolutely no breeze) and I direct it straight up even 3-4 feet. Otherwise, it’s an interesting toy to see if a full size drone is something that you really want.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Nesvold

customer_reviews.title: I think it is the best drone for you $
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised how stable durable and easy to fly this drone is. The 720p HD video high res still photos it is producing are outstanding. I like that it lowers the altitude when the battery threshold is reached. I did an areal video of the wedding on the beach and the newly weds were ecstatic when I sent them the youtube link. The altitude hold is solid. It is great for novice and in the sports mode it can be very fast.
customer_reviews.author: igrex

customer_reviews.title: Great Durable Drone and Excellent Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner drone. Great for learning how to pilot drones. Easy to use right out of the box. Included instructions are a bit erroneous, and not as thorough as they could be, but the primary functions are nominally comprehensible. As so many reviewers point out, beginners will invariably crash in their first flights. I crashed indoors several times. All that abuse, and it is no worse for wear. Strongly advise installing blade guards before use. Pros -Good Customer Service -Reasonable Cost -Extra parts and Battery Cons -This is a bit of a weird one but i wish the camera was faster to update -Instructions could've been more clear Overall, I'd recommend this to a friend :)
customer_reviews.author: Fares G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners like me. I've never flown any quadcopter drone, but I felt pretty comfortable after reading through the manual and watching a few videos. Reading other users reviews helped too. There are some grammatical translation in the manual, but nothing significant. I have been able to fly inside (has been way too windy to try outside flight yet) with no mishaps! Assembly and setup was pretty straightforward. The downloaded app to use for video/pics & FPV flight works nicely. I'd recommend this for anyone entering the drone market for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rood

customer_reviews.title: Cute little drone
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute drone. Camera is OK, I wish I could twist it to down view. Battery life is not longer than advertised. But Holy Stone offers a free extra battery for positive review. On the other hand I'd give positive review regardless of the battery promotion. This drone is much fun. I hope it will last for a while. Also customer support does exist. I was chatting with Jolin @ Holy Stone because landing pad was keep falling off from the air. I was educated I can secure it with a screw. I like the toy and pleased with support.
customer_reviews.author: GvG

customer_reviews.title: Great drone, and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great drone for the money! I am a first time drone user, and I was able to pick it up quickly. Make sure you have a good amount of room to fly when learning to fly. Even though it's very fast, it controls very well. For me, the best part of it was the customer service. I had an issue happen when using the app to fly, and I called them and left a message to call me back please ( I called out of business hours) that same day I got a call back and they were very nice and solved my problem right away. Overall I would recommend this drone to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for the price point and for a first time drone owner
customer_reviews.text: My husband is really happy with his Drone so far! It's a great beginner Drone and I think the video is pretty good for the price point. We did run into a little snafu with the landing skids (which you need to tighten once they are in so they don't come off, by the way) and the customer service at Holy Stone took care of us and a new of landing skids are on the way! Prompt responses and they took care of us. Looking forward to the weather warming up, so he can get out and fly it more!
customer_reviews.author: Lara A

customer_reviews.title: great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: This is my third drone and by far the best quality (my other drones were the holy stone HS170 mini drones that only lasted a week). I decided to go bigger this time. I have had it for over a month and it is still going fine. The voice control doesn't work very well, neither does the gesture control, but they are not required to fly. If do not calibrate it correctly it will rocket into the sky this happened but I stopped it with the emergency stop function. The images are fisheyed and kind of fuzzy but I am not bothered by it. Overall it is a great drone for price.
customer_reviews.author: Lillekari

customer_reviews.title: GONE!
customer_reviews.text: The first day the drone was fun, the kids and I enjoyed it. Day 2 after about 5 minutes of play, on take off I lost control. It went up and took a nice picture, the last picture it would ever take. It kept going up, I had no control. It turned into a dot in the sky now lost in the western Maryland wilderness. I gave it 3 stars because it did work for a while, was fun and only $60
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Neff

customer_reviews.title: we enjoyed the drone
customer_reviews.text: I "liked" the drone. However, my son flew it away this afternoon, never to see it again. The "one key return" did not work at all. Once he got it in the air (probably 150 ft+/-), the drone flew off and did not respond to anything from the remote. Up until that point, we enjoyed the drone. Now, obviously not so much. However, Libby with customer service was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene L Brunson

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level drone
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level drop for the price! Purchased for a gift and it was definitely love at first sight. Drone was packed well, nothing missing or broken, charge time is comparable to others on the market, as is fly time. It was “crash” landed a few times and landing gear did pop off but went back on just fine. Easy to connect to the app for use on the phone, a little tricky for less tech savvy people. Campers works great, not the clearest picture but not horrible either. Over all I would say that this is a great drone to get you started or for a teen-young adult just learning to fly one.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Hicks

customer_reviews.title: A fun first drone.
customer_reviews.text: The learning curve is very quick. I was comfortable flying the drone after the first couple of flights. It connects quickly and easily to my iPhone. The batteries have lasted ten minutes or more. The picture quality is decent and streams quickly to my phone. It is light so I would not recommend using on windy day. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Also sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I'm not a good pilot, can't do 2 things at same time. Flew this drone into the tree on 1st day. Surprisingly, and luckily, it wasn't stuck badly. After a few restarts, the drone was able to break loose and fly out. No damage. When flying outside, it's better to use higher speeds, as the slow speed is not enough to overcome any winds. The drone is otherwise very stable, and holds its position. Doesn't have other fancy new tracking, following features. Great for this price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pon

customer_reviews.title: Good, but the part that holds the camera can break easily
customer_reviews.text: WAIT! DON’T ASSUME THINGS! This is an amazing drone that I recommend for beginners and for people who have flown drones before. Just be careful running with it. One of the two things that hold the camera on mine broke. The other one can support it, but just be careful. Other then that, it is amazing! A great drone for pictures and videos with and without sound. The front, back, and side flips are super cool and so is how easy it is to take off and land. I highly recommend this drone!
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Rank

customer_reviews.title: good drone with a lot of features
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone and after many hours researching drones I decided on this one. I Liked the features it has and the price. I think is a great starter drone. I flies nicely indoors have not taken it outside it has been to windy. I do not have any experience flying drones but i got the hang of this one only after a few crashes. The FPV works well with the my iphone and gives a clear picture. The only thing bad would be the instructions are a little short. I would recommend this drone to anyone looking for a good starter drone. I would also have to say the customer service is great.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: It just flew away on its own!  BUT, they gave us a new one!
customer_reviews.text: It was a good drone. Had fun time the first 2 days using it for about 4 flights. Then, on the 5th flight, it just took off straight in the air and did not respond to any commands! It went straight up in the air well over 500 feet high until we couldn’t see it anymore! We drove all over the city looking for it! Very sad. BUT, we sent an email to Holy Stone and they sent us a new one!! It works great!!! Great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: The drone lacked many problems
customer_reviews.text: This drone had so many issues. First the drone didn’t respond correctly to commands from the controller. Second, the camera always fell off because it has a low grade plastic support that doesn’t hold. Also, customer service was not helpful. Contact me for more detailed information I can’t share on the review
customer_reviews.author: Cefcon

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction Forsure
customer_reviews.text: I got my drone in a went to town putting it together. It did as instructed and powered everything up and I hit the throttle and up it went. It did not hover as advertised. It floated to the right. I contacted Holy Stone and they worked with me and found there was a defect with unit. They sent me a replacement right away and allowed me to keep the defected drone for parts. That truly made me feel as thought I was a valued customer & truly concerned with my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Flo Blank

product_meta.title: Holy Stone F181W 1080P WiFi FPV Drone with Wide-Angle HD Camera Live Video RC Quadcopter with Altitude Hold, Gravity Sensor Function, RTF and Easy to Fly for Beginner & Kids, 2 Batteries Included
feature_bullets: 1080P 120° FOV HD Wifi CAMERA: Equipped with the newest adjustable 1080P 120° Wide-angle HD Wifi Camera, which allows you to take high-res pictures & video during flight. You may control the camera by Gestures (Paper--Video & Scissor--Photo).

FPV REAL-TIME TRANSMITTION: With the built-in WiFi module, you can see exactly what your camera sees with a live video on your mobile device by installing the APP. You can also use Voice Control and Trajectory Flight when the App is on.

AUTOMATIC ALTITUDE HOLD: Powerful air pressure altitude hold function allows you to release the throttle stick and the drone will keep hovering at the current height. Easy for you to shoot quality images or videos.

EASY SAFE AND FUN TO PLAY FOR BEGINNERS: Built-in the latest 6-axis flight control systems offer strong stability, easily implement various flight movements, stronger wind resistance; Headless mode eliminates need to adjust aircraft position before flight & improves learning curve.
DOUBLE FLIGHT TIME: Includes 2 strong powerful 3.7V 750 mAh LiPo batteries to extend the fun to 20 Minutes! FAA Registration NOT Required.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,304 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
